verbs.description: As [ARG0: he] [V: uproots] [ARG1: another effective foreign policy] [ARGM-CAU: for no reason] , dealmaking is proving to be one of Donald Trump ’s biggest weaknesses .
As he uproots another effective foreign policy for no reason , [V: dealmaking] is proving to be one of Donald Trump ’s biggest weaknesses .
As he uproots another effective foreign policy for no reason , dealmaking [V: is] proving to be one of Donald Trump ’s biggest weaknesses .
[ARGM-ADV: As he uproots another effective foreign policy for no reason] , [ARG1: dealmaking] is [V: proving] [C-ARG1: to be one of Donald Trump ’s biggest weaknesses] .
As he uproots another effective foreign policy for no reason , [ARG1: dealmaking] is proving to [V: be] [ARG2: one of Donald Trump ’s biggest weaknesses] .
